-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A spine-view on types
--   
--   This is very much a "bumping up" of the term-level <i>spine view</i>,
--   c.f. Hinze's work and Emil Axelsson's hackage package
--   <tt>syntactic</tt>.
--   
--   See the <tt>type-cereal</tt> and <tt>type-ord</tt> packages for use
--   cases (ultimately supporting the <tt>yoko</tt> package).
@package type-spine
@version 0.2.20120924


-- | Template Haskell in support of the spine-view on types.
module Type.Spine.TH
toNameG :: Name -> Q Name

-- | A Template Haskell-lifter for data constructors' <a>NameG</a>s.
liftNameG_d :: Name -> Q Exp

-- | Returns the kinds of a type constructor's type parameters and range.
tyConSignature :: Name -> Q ([Kind], Kind)
tvb_kind :: TyVarBndr -> Kind

module Type.Spine.Base
data Atom (t :: k) :: *
data (:@) (tc :: k) (t :: l) :: *

-- | <tt>spineType_d n</tt> generates the <tt>Spine</tt> instance for the
--   type named <tt>n</tt>.
spineType_d :: Name -> Q [Dec]

-- | <tt>spineType_d_ n ks</tt> generates the <tt>Spine</tt> instance for
--   the type named <tt>n</tt> that has parameters with kinds <tt>ks</tt>.
spineType_d_ :: Name -> [Kind] -> Q [Dec]

-- | <tt>spineType_pro n</tt> generates the <tt>Spine</tt> instance for the
--   promoted data constructor named <tt>n</tt>.
spineType_pro :: Name -> Q [Dec]

-- | <tt>spineType_pro_ n ks</tt> generates the <tt>Spine</tt> instance for
--   the promoted data constructor named <tt>n</tt> that has parameters
--   with kinds <tt>ks</tt>.
spineType_pro_ :: Name -> [Kind] -> Q [Dec]

-- | <tt>spineType_gen_ ty ks</tt> generates the <tt>Spine</tt> instance
--   for the type <tt>ty</tt> that has parameters with kinds <tt>ks</tt>.
spineType_gen_ :: Type -> [Kind] -> Q [Dec]


-- | The spine-view on types.
module Type.Spine
data Atom (t :: k) :: *
data (:@) (tc :: k) (t :: l) :: *

-- | <tt>spineType_d n</tt> generates the <tt>Spine</tt> instance for the
--   type named <tt>n</tt>.
spineType_d :: Name -> Q [Dec]

-- | <tt>spineType_d_ n ks</tt> generates the <tt>Spine</tt> instance for
--   the type named <tt>n</tt> that has parameters with kinds <tt>ks</tt>.
spineType_d_ :: Name -> [Kind] -> Q [Dec]

-- | <tt>spineType_pro n</tt> generates the <tt>Spine</tt> instance for the
--   promoted data constructor named <tt>n</tt>.
spineType_pro :: Name -> Q [Dec]

-- | <tt>spineType_pro_ n ks</tt> generates the <tt>Spine</tt> instance for
--   the promoted data constructor named <tt>n</tt> that has parameters
--   with kinds <tt>ks</tt>.
spineType_pro_ :: Name -> [Kind] -> Q [Dec]
